casebody.data:
LOEBE
v.
WORLEY. No. 401P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Robbie W. Worley, Pro Se. Janet L. Shires, General Counsel, for NC Property Tax Commission.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2006 by Petitioner for "Petition for Judicial Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
